name: My Fortune
description:
My Fortune – Race to Financial Freedom (Australian Edition) is a single player
simulator board game in which you select a starting salary and progress along
the board following the requirements of the square landed on. You will learn
to manage cashflow, make decisions regarding living expenses, get married
and have kids, build your retirement fund and buy a home, investment
properties and a share portfolio. My aim is to help people of any age to
improve their financial literacy and prompt exploration into fundamental
personal finance concepts.
